extension.summary: Live streaming and magazines from Hessischer Rundfunk TV
extension.description: This add-on provides access to the HR TV live stream and some local food/cultural magazine shows.
extension.news: 1.1.0 - Added configurable fetching/displaying of 'Playing now' info in live stream menu item (see 'Settings' to enable or disable fetching/displaying) - Added more magazine content (see 'Settings' to disable or enable certain shows showing up in list)
